entry.lex: Aaron S Daggett was born in Maine and died in West Roxbury. He fought in the American Civil War and was awarded the Purple Heart.
Maine born Aaron S Daggett fought in the American Civil War, was awarded the Purple Heart and died in West Roxbury.
American Civil War soldier and Purple Heart recipient Aaron S. Daggett, was born in Maine and died in West Roxbury.
Abdul Taib Mahmud was born in Miri, Malaysia and he lives in Kuching. His party is the Parti Pesaka Bumiputera Bersatu and he represented Asajaya.
Mirir, Malaysia born Abdul Taib Mahmud, who lives in Kuching, represented the Asajaya region and was a member of the Parti Pesaka Bumiputera Bersatu.
Abdul Taib Mahmud, who was born in Miri, Malaysia and lives in Kuching, was a member of the Parti Pesaka Bumiputera Bersatu and represented Asajaya.

entry.lex: Abdul Taib Mahmud, who was born in the Kingdom of Sarawak and who lived in Demak Jaya, Jalan Bako, Kuching, Sarawak, represented Kota Samarahan and was a member of the Parti Pesaka Bumiputera Bersatu.
Abdul Taib Mahmud belongs to the Parti Pesaka Bumiputera Bersatu and represented Kota Samarahan. He was born in the Kingdom of Sarawak and lived in Demak Jaya, Jalan Bako, Kuching, Sarawak.

entry.lex: Abel Caballero was born in Galicia, Spain, belongs to the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party, and worked as a Member of the Congress of Deputies.
Abel Caballero, who belongs to the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party, is a member of the Congress of Deputies. Caballero was born in Galicia, Spain.
Abel Caballero was born in Galicia in Spain. He worked as a Member of the Congress of Deputies and is a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party.

entry.lex: John N Dempsey's predecessor Abraham A Ribicoff was born in the United States, worked as the United States Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare and died in New York City.
Abraham A Ribicoff, who was born in the US and died in New York City, worked as the United States Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare and was succeeded by John N Dempsey.
United States Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare member Abraham A Ribicoff, born in the U.S and died in New York City, preceded John N Dempsey.
Pole Adam Koc fought in the Polish–Soviet War. A commander of that war was Joseph Stalin and one of the languages spoken in Poland is Kashubian.
Adam Koc's nationality is Polish and he fought in the Polish-Soviet War. Joseph Stalin was a commander in that war. The Kashubian language is spoken in Poland.
Adam Koc is from Poland, where the Kashubian language is spoken. He fought in the Polish-Soviet War where Joseph Stalin was a commander.
Adam Koc, born in Congress Poland, was involved in battles in the Polish–Soviet War. Joseph Stalin was a commander at the Polish-Soviet War, which was a conflict within the Russian Civil War.
Adam Koc was born in Congress, Poland, and was involved in battles in the Polish–Soviet War. This war was part of the Russian Civil War military conflict and Joseph Stalin was one of the commanders.
Adam Koc was born in Congress in Poland and fought in the Polish-Soviet War which was part of the Russian Civil War military conflict. A commander in this war was Joseph Stalin.

Adonis Georgiadis, a member of the Greek New Democracy Party (the party's colour is blue), was in office while Antonis Samaras was Prime Minister. Konstantinos Mitsotakis was the successor to Antonis Samaras.

Adonis Georgiadis, is a member of the Greek New Democracy Party, the colour of which is blue. Adonis Georgiadis was in office while Antonis Samaras, was Prime Minister. Konstantinos Mitsotakis was the successor to Antonis Samaras.
Adonis Georgiadis was a member of the New Democracy Party in Greece under Prime Minister Antonis Samaras. Samaras was succeeded by Konstantinos Mitsotakis and the party's colours are blue.
Born in Knightsbridge, Airey Neave; began his career on March 4th 1974, fought in the Battle of France, and ended his career on 30th March 1979.
Airey Neave was born in Knightsbridge and began his career on March 4th 1974. He fought in the Battle of France and ended his career on March 30th 1979.
Knightsbridge born Airey Neave, who fought in the Battle of France, had a career which lasted from March 4th 1974 to 30th March 1979.
Alberto Teisaire, born on May 20, 1891, was a Rear Admiral originating from Mendoza, Argentina. He preceded Isaac Rojas.
Alberto teisaire was born in Mendoza, Argentina on May 20th, 1891, and worked as a Rear Admiral, later succeeded by Isaac Rojas.
Alberto Teisaire was born on May 20th 1891 in Mendoza, Argentina and became a Rear Admiral. He was succeeded by Isaac Rojas.
Alfons Gorbach was born in Austria-Hungary in the state of Tyrol. He died in Styria in Graz.
Alfons Gorbach was born in Austria-Hungary in Tyrol state. He died in Styria in Graz.
Alfons Gorbach was born in the County of Tyrol in Austria-Hungary and died in Styria, Graz.
Allan Shivers was born in Lufkin, Texas and served in the Democratic Party in the U.S. He worked as the Governor of Texas and was succeeded by, Price Daniel.
U.S. Democratic Party member and Texas Governor, Allan Shivers, was born in Lufkin, Texas. He was succeeded by Price Daniel.
United States Democratic Party member and Governor of Texas Allan Shivers was born in Lufkin, Texas and succeeded by Price Daniel.
Alvah Sabin was from Vermont where the largest city is Burlington. He represented Vermont's 3rd Congressional District and eventually died in Sycamore, Illinois.
Alvah Sabin represented Vermont's 3rd Congressional District. The state's largest city is Burlington and Sabin died in Sycamore, Illinois.
